QuestData.Title: Priorities!
QuestData.Description: Just look at this mess! All that brew gone to waste!$b$bTaran Zhu warned us against speaking to you outsiders, but I'll take any help I can get.$b$bWe were on our way to Dawn's Blossom to deliver our brew when the fighting broke out. Now all of our brew has been lost!$b$bYou want to make it up to us? Maybe you can find some of our Honeybrew barrels that haven't been broken. Then it wouldn't be a complete loss.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find 6 Barrels of Honeybrew in Honeydew Glade.
